prompts: Create a playful Pokemon that loves to explore grassy fields and is small in size.
I want a fluffy creature with big ears that can evolve into multiple forms depending on its environment.
Generate an adorable Pokemon with a brown color scheme that is known for its friendly demeanor.
Make a Pokemon that can adapt to various habitats, appearing in forests and urban areas alike.
Imagine a cute Pokemon with a round body and expressive features, perfect for a children's game.
Design a Pokemon that has the ability to charm its opponents with its cute appearance and playful nature.
Show me a small, furry Pokemon that can evolve into different types based on elemental stones.
